thread.title: New Year's Day spotting of a ‘demon’ in Phoenix scares internet
thread.title_full: New Year's Day spotting of a ‘demon’ in Phoenix scares internet

author: BRIAN LISI
title: New Year's Day spotting of a ‘demon’ in Phoenix scares internet
text:
SEE IT: New Year's Day spotting of a ‘demon’ in Phoenix scaring the internet to death New Year's Day spotting of a ‘demon’ in Phoenix scares internet Facebook user Richard Christianson posted a picture of a “demon” (pictured) on New Year’s Day. (Richard Christianson/Facebook)  35 AM 
Friend, foe or ficus? 
Posted by Richard Christianson, a grainy photo appears to show a soldier of Satan standing on a patch of grass along a dark Phoenix street, minding his own business. 
As FOX 10 reports, the image has since gone viral, netting over 81,000 shares on Facebook as of Wednesday morning. 
The intrigued Facebook user captioned the ambiguous image with the question, "What the hell do you see in this picture for reals?" 
Donald Trump sports devil horns on TIME’s ‘Person of the Year’ 
Accordingly, the internet responded by offering theories from everything between a demon, an angel and Palm tree. 
As Christianson updated his profile picture early Tuesday morning to show himself sitting in a chair while wearing a gold chain, we can at least safely assume he and every other Phoenixer have not been dragged to hell. Tags:
